title: 334. 5 Psychology Terms You’re Probably Misusing
description: We all like to throw around terms that describe human behavior — “bystander apathy” and “steep learning curve” and “hard-wired.” Most of the time, they don't actually mean what we think they mean. But don't worry — the experts are getting it wrong, too.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
